body: http://llvm.org/docs/CodingStandards.html#use-early-exits-and-continue-to-simplify-code --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/toxcore/78)

comment_regular_data.body: --- Reviewed 31 of 31 files at r1. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved, some commit checks failed. --- _Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/toxcore/78#-:-KQaaOy7CTDde08FEVD3:bnfp4nl)_

Reviewed 1 of 31 files at r1, 23 of 23 files at r2.
Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 3 unresolved discussions.

---

_[toxcore/DHT.c, line 2507 [r2]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/toxcore/78#-KQcTEMdE7MGeMcvFxli:-KQcTEMeqx8rgzsnDkOX:b-gigwy2) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/toxcore/blob/79d6cc11e8f4fc5f558471d6d70f1ef5e2124bdb/toxcore/DHT.c#L2507)):_

> ``` C
>             return dht->cryptopackethandlers[number].function(dht->cryptopackethandlers[number].object, source, public_key,
>                     data, len);
>         } /* If request is not for us, try routing it. */
> ```

Move the comment one line lower?

---

_[toxcore/net_crypto.c, line 1396 [r2]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/toxcore/78#-KQcU3jvCkqUiW9RQHPV:-KQcU3jvCkqUiW9RQHPW:b23muxu) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/toxcore/blob/579bdc126f3054e27224b2b612eea52eb22e8507/toxcore/net_crypto.c#L1396)):_

> ``` C
>         } else {
>             //TODO?
>         }
> ```

I think that `else` part has to stay for the 'TODO' to make sense.

---

_[toxcore/net_crypto.c, line 1543 [r2]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/toxcore/78#-KQcULMqIxjYHpQ0rVHx:-KQcULMrBFhkMzY2n0zq:b-a582bc) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/toxcore/blob/579bdc126f3054e27224b2b612eea52eb22e8507/toxcore/net_crypto.c#L1543)):_

> ``` C
>             }
> 
>             return 0;
> ```

That's interesting. Looks like some logic error with that unnecessary `return 0`, or someone just forgot to remove it while extending code.

---

_Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/toxcore/78)_

verification.payload:
tree e7894501bd010d9904fe0069fc1b8121d2da4040
parent 6f42eadc54e81be50b7a817c72b0cf4d7ec5feb4
author iphydf <iphydf@users.noreply.github.com> 1472672420 +0100
committer iphydf <iphydf@users.noreply.github.com> 1472810576 +0100

Do not use `else` after `return`.

http://llvm.org/docs/CodingStandards.html#use-early-exits-and-continue-to-simplify-code

title: Do not use `else` after `return`.
